dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5507 IH: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to establish a Disinformation Governance Board.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Pfluger (for himself, Ms. Greene of Georgia, Mr. Jackson of Texas, Mr. Reschenthaler, Mr. Rouzer, and Mr. Ellzey) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to establish a Disinformation Governance Board.

section.header: Prohibition on establishment of a Disinformation Governance Board
section.text: No Federal funds authorized to be appropriated or otherwise made available to the Secretary of Homeland Security may be made available for the establishment of a Disinformation Governance Board.
